POST /accounts/{account_id}/browser-rend.description: Fetches rendered HTML content from provided URL or HTML. Check available options like `gotoOptions` and `waitFor*` to control page load behaviour.

parameters.description: Cache TTL default is 5s. Set to 0 to disable.
parameters.name: cacheTTL

schema.description: Cache TTL default is 5s. Set to 0 to disable.

actionTimeout.description: The maximum duration allowed for the browser action to complete after the page has loaded (such as taking screenshots, extracting content, or generating PDFs). If this time limit is exceeded, the action stops and returns a timeout error.

addScriptTag.description: Adds a `<script>` tag into the page with the desired URL or content.

addStyleTag.description: Adds a `<link rel="stylesheet">` tag into the page with the desired URL or a `<style type="text/css">` tag with the content.

allowRequestPattern.description: Only allow requests that match the provided regex patterns, eg. '/^.*\.(css)'.

allowResourceTypes.description: Only allow requests that match the provided resource types, eg. 'image' or 'script'.

bestAttempt.description: Attempt to proceed when 'awaited' events fail or timeout.

html.description:
Set the content of the page, eg: `

Hello World!!

`. Either `html` or `url` must be set.

rejectRequestPattern.description: Block undesired requests that match the provided regex patterns, eg. '/^.*\.(css)'.

rejectResourceTypes.description: Block undesired requests that match the provided resource types, eg. 'image' or 'script'.

userAgent.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

waitForSelector.description: Wait for the selector to appear in page. Check [options](https://pptr.dev/api/puppeteer.page.waitforselector).

waitForTimeout.description: Waits for a specified timeout before continuing.

400.description: The request contains errors or didn't properly encode content.

422.description: Request failed due to site-related issues such as timeouts, SSL errors, or inaccessible content.

POST /accounts/{account_id}/browser-rend.description: Gets json from a webpage from a provided URL or HTML. Pass `prompt` or `schema` in the body. Control page loading with `gotoOptions` and `waitFor*` options.

parameters.description: Cache TTL default is 5s. Set to 0 to disable.
parameters.name: cacheTTL

schema.description: Cache TTL default is 5s. Set to 0 to disable.

actionTimeout.description: The maximum duration allowed for the browser action to complete after the page has loaded (such as taking screenshots, extracting content, or generating PDFs). If this time limit is exceeded, the action stops and returns a timeout error.

addScriptTag.description: Adds a `<script>` tag into the page with the desired URL or content.

addStyleTag.description: Adds a `<link rel="stylesheet">` tag into the page with the desired URL or a `<style type="text/css">` tag with the content.

allowRequestPattern.description: Only allow requests that match the provided regex patterns, eg. '/^.*\.(css)'.

allowResourceTypes.description: Only allow requests that match the provided resource types, eg. 'image' or 'script'.

bestAttempt.description: Attempt to proceed when 'awaited' events fail or timeout.

custom_ai.description: Optional list of custom AI models to use for the request. The models will be tried in the order provided, and in case a model returns an error, the next one will be used as fallback.

authorization.description: Authorization token for the AI model: `Bearer <token>`.

model.description: AI model to use for the request. Must be formed as `<provider>/<model_name>`, e.g. `workers-ai/@cf/meta/llama-3.3-70b-instruct-fp8-fast`

html.description:
Set the content of the page, eg: `

Hello World!!

`. Either `html` or `url` must be set.

rejectRequestPattern.description: Block undesired requests that match the provided regex patterns, eg. '/^.*\.(css)'.

rejectResourceTypes.description: Block undesired requests that match the provided resource types, eg. 'image' or 'script'.

json_schema.description: Schema for the response format. More information here: https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers-ai/json-mode/

userAgent.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

waitForSelector.description: Wait for the selector to appear in page. Check [options](https://pptr.dev/api/puppeteer.page.waitforselector).

waitForTimeout.description: Waits for a specified timeout before continuing.

200.description: Returns the JSON based on a user prompt or json schema

400.description: The request contains errors or didn't properly encode content.

422.description: Request failed due to site-related issues such as timeouts, SSL errors, or inaccessible content.

POST /accounts/{account_id}/browser-rend.description: Fetches rendered PDF from provided URL or HTML. Check available options like `gotoOptions` and `waitFor*` to control page load behaviour.

parameters.description: Cache TTL default is 5s. Set to 0 to disable.
parameters.name: cacheTTL

schema.description: Cache TTL default is 5s. Set to 0 to disable.

actionTimeout.description: The maximum duration allowed for the browser action to complete after the page has loaded (such as taking screenshots, extracting content, or generating PDFs). If this time limit is exceeded, the action stops and returns a timeout error.

addScriptTag.description: Adds a `<script>` tag into the page with the desired URL or content.

addStyleTag.description: Adds a `<link rel="stylesheet">` tag into the page with the desired URL or a `<style type="text/css">` tag with the content.

allowRequestPattern.description: Only allow requests that match the provided regex patterns, eg. '/^.*\.(css)'.

allowResourceTypes.description: Only allow requests that match the provided resource types, eg. 'image' or 'script'.

bestAttempt.description: Attempt to proceed when 'awaited' events fail or timeout.

html.description:
Set the content of the page, eg: `

Hello World!!

`. Either `html` or `url` must be set.

displayHeaderFooter.description: Whether to show the header and footer.

footerTemplate.description: HTML template for the print footer.

format.description: Paper format. Takes priority over width and height if set.

headerTemplate.description: HTML template for the print header.

height.description: Sets the height of paper. Can be a number or string with unit.

landscape.description: Whether to print in landscape orientation.

margin.description: Set the PDF margins. Useful when setting header and footer.

omitBackground.description: Hides default white background and allows generating pdfs with transparency.

preferCSSPageSize.description: Give CSS @page size priority over other size declarations.

printBackground.description: Set to true to print background graphics.

scale.description: Scales the rendering of the web page. Amount must be between 0.1 and 2.

width.description: Sets the width of paper. Can be a number or string with unit.

rejectRequestPattern.description: Block undesired requests that match the provided regex patterns, eg. '/^.*\.(css)'.

rejectResourceTypes.description: Block undesired requests that match the provided resource types, eg. 'image' or 'script'.

userAgent.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

waitForSelector.description: Wait for the selector to appear in page. Check [options](https://pptr.dev/api/puppeteer.page.waitforselector).

waitForTimeout.description: Waits for a specified timeout before continuing.

400.description: The request contains errors or didn't properly encode content.

422.description: Request failed due to site-related issues such as timeouts, SSL errors, or inaccessible content.
